products.title: Pure Perfect Fit
products.description: A brilliant white shade, the pure white 25mm perfect fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any white upvc window or door. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected.

products.title: Polar Perfect Fit
products.description: An off-white shade, thepolar white25mm perfect fit blindis the perfect addition to any living space. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.

products.title: Artisan Off White
products.description: Artisan off white made to measure roman blind artisan off white made to measure roman blind.

products.title: Infusion Asc White Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc white perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Galaxy Asc Blackout White Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their galaxy blackout range, where advanced solar control (asc) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.

products.title: Hive Plain White Perfect Fit
products.description: Hiveplain white perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric. Made to measure hive plain white perfect fit pleated blind px71001.

products.title: Hive Blackout White Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackout white perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Gloss White Perfect Fit
products.description: This gloss perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.description: This perforated white perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.description: Perfect fit polar wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.
